["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://ceph.io/","rel":"nofollow","children":"Ceph"}]," 是一个开源软件存储平台，在单个分布式计算机集群上实现对象存储。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["请参考",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/install/get-packages/","rel":"nofollow","children":"Ceph 官方安装教程"}],"，只需要把文档中出现的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"download.ceph.com"}]," 替换为以下链接即可。"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"以 Debian Buster 为例，举例如下："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"wget -q -O- 'https://download.ceph.com/keys/release.asc' | {{sudo}}gpg -o /etc/apt/keyrings/ceph.gpg --dearmor
{{sudo}}apt-add-repository 'deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/ceph.gpg] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/debian-octopus/ buster main'
{{sudo}}apt update","codeLanguage":"shell"}]]}]

meta.title: Ceph 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
